TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit ExpressionEditor extends System.Object

summary.span: 定義一組屬性和方法用於評估在設計階段與控制項屬性關聯的運算式，並用於將運算式編輯器工作表提供給視覺化設計主應用程式，以在運算式編輯器對話方塊中使用。

span.span: Defines a set of properties and methods for evaluating an expression that is associated with a control property at design time and to provide an expression editor sheet to the visual design host for use in the expression editor dialog box.
This class is abstract.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 視覺化設計工具裝載，例如[!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)]，會使用類別來呈現自訂運算式編輯器，使用者的工作表，然後評估 設計階段呈現選取的運算式。A visual designer host, such as [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)], uses the class to present custom expression editor sheets to the user, and then evaluate the selected expression for design-time rendering. 當您瀏覽屬性在設計階段屬性方格控制項的視覺化設計工具會顯示對話方塊，以設定控制項屬性的運算式。When you browse the property for a control in the design-time Properties grid, the visual designer displays a dialog box to set expressions for a control property. 您可以選取清單運算式前置字元為基礎的運算式型別。You can select the expression type based on a list of expression prefixes. 當您從清單中選取運算式前置字元時，視覺化設計工具會使用相關聯和物件來設定，評估及轉換為該類型的運算式語法為基礎的運算式字串。When you select an expression prefix from the list, the visual designer uses the associated and objects to set, evaluate, and convert the expression string based on the syntax for that type of expression. 視覺化設計工具設定相關聯的控制項的屬性運算式，，然後再使用評估的運算式結果指派控制項的設計介面上所呈現的屬性值。The visual designer sets the expression for the associated control property, and then uses the evaluated expression result to assign control property values that are rendered on the design surface. 靜態方法取得與特定運算式前置字元或運算式產生器相關聯的運算式編輯器。The static methods get the expression editor that is associated with a particular expression prefix or expression builder. 屬性物件傳回設定的運算式前置字元。The property for an object returns the configured expression prefix. 方法評估輸入的運算式字串。The method evaluates an input expression string. 方法會傳回自訂運算式中的屬性運算式對話方塊用來提示的實作。The method returns the implementation that is used to prompt for the custom expression properties in the expressions dialog box. 一般而言，若要在設計階段支援新的運算式型別，您定義的唯一運算式前置詞，並提供自訂和實作。Typically, to support a new expression type at design time, you define a unique expression prefix and provide custom and implementations. 或者，您可以提供自訂定義用來形成 [運算式] 對話方塊中的運算式屬性的實作。Optionally, you can provide a custom implementation that defines properties that are used to form the expression in the expressions dialog box. 運算式前置詞會識別自訂運算式型別，並關聯運算式產生器和運算式編輯器的運算式。The expression prefix identifies the custom expression type and associates an expression with the expression builder and expression editor. 當自訂運算式剖析在頁面中時，運算式前置詞用來建立執行個體相關聯的和類別。When custom expressions are parsed in a page, the expression prefix is used to create instances of the associated and classes. 若要使用運算式產生器和運算式編輯器關聯運算式前置字元，套用和屬性加入自訂類別，並設定運算式產生器中運算式前置字元`expressionBuilders`Web 組態檔中的項目。To associate an expression prefix with an expression builder and expression editor, apply the and attributes to the custom class and configure the expression prefix for an expression builder in the `expressionBuilders` element in the Web configuration file. 前置詞，則不需要，但強烈建議。The prefix is not required, but highly recommended. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何從衍生類別來定義自訂運算式編輯器。The following code example demonstrates how to derive from the class to define a custom expression editor. [!code-csharp[CustomExpressionEditor#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/customexpressioneditor/cs/CustomAppSettingsExpression.cs#1)]

block.para:
下列步驟所需的衍生自訂類別：
The following steps are required in deriving a custom class:
- 覆寫方法，在設計階段評估自訂運算式型別。Override the method to evaluate the custom expression type at design time.
- 選擇性地覆寫方法傳回的自訂類別定義結合以形成自訂運算式的內容。Optionally, override the method to return a custom class that defines properties that are combined to form the custom expression.
- 套用屬性類別宣告，自訂運算式產生器與衍生的運算式編輯器類別。Apply the attribute on the class declaration to associate the custom expression builder with the derived expression editor class.例如，類別衍生自類別，並提供用於評估和關聯的控制項屬性中的資源字串參考，在設計階段實作。For example, the class derives from the class and provides an implementation for evaluating and associating a resource string reference with a control property at design time.類別是運算式前置詞相關聯和實作。The class is associated with the expression prefix and the implementation.方法會傳回，其定義的個別屬性，以形成資源參考運算式。The method returns a , which defines the individual properties that form a resource reference expression.

.method familyhidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed
Protected Sub New ()
protected: ExpressionEditor();

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 因為類別是抽象的您無法建立的執行個體類別直接使用建構函式。Because the class is abstract, you cannot create an instance of the class directly using the constructor.

para.span: 衍生自類別，覆寫建構函式來實作您的運算式編輯器實作的自訂初始化動作。

span.span: When deriving from the class, override the constructor to implement custom initialization actions for your expression editor implementation.

MemberSignature.Value: public abstract object EvaluateExpression (string expression, object parseTimeData, Type propertyType, IServiceProvider serviceProvider);

.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance object EvaluateExpression(string expression, object parseTimeData, class System.Type propertyType, class System.IServiceProvider serviceProvider) cil managed
Public MustOverride Function EvaluateExpression (expression As String, parseTimeData As Object, propertyType As Type, serviceProvider As IServiceProvider) As Object
public: abstract System::Object ^ EvaluateExpression(System::String ^ expression, System::Object ^ parseTimeData, Type ^ propertyType, IServiceProvider ^ serviceProvider);

param.name: expression

span.span: An expression string to evaluate.

param.span: 運算式不包含運算式前置字元。

span.span: The expression does not include the expression prefix.

param.name: parseTimeData
param.span: 包含用於評估 expression 之其他剖析資訊的物件。

span.span: An object containing additional parsing information for evaluating expression.

param.span: 這通常由運算式產生器提供。

span.span: This typically is provided by the expression builder.

param.name: propertyType
param.span: expression 所繫結之控制項屬性的類型。

span.span: The type of the control property to which expression is bound.

param.name: serviceProvider
param.span: 服務提供者實作，由設計工具主應用程式 (Designer Host) 提供，可以用來取得額外的設計階段服務。

span.span: A service provider implementation supplied by the designer host, used to obtain additional design-time services.

summary.span: 評估運算式字串，並提供控制項屬性的設計階段值。

span.span: Evaluates an expression string and provides the design-time value for a control property.

returns.span: 運算式評估成功時，評估的運算式字串所參考的物件，否則為 。

span.span: The object referenced by the evaluated expression string, if the expression evaluation succeeded; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 視覺化設計工具主應用程式使用方法來評估運算式，並提供設計階段相關聯的控制項屬性值。The visual designer host uses the method to evaluate an expression and provide the design-time value for an associated control property. 視覺化設計工具使用方法來剖析的運算式字串在設計階段，然後呼叫剖析的運算式資料的方法。The visual designer uses the method to parse the expression string at design time, and then calls the method with the parsed expression data. 視覺化設計工具可用於評估的運算式結果指派控制項的設計介面上所呈現的屬性值。The visual designer uses the evaluated expression result to assign control property values that are rendered on the design surface.

block.para:
類別衍生自類別必須覆寫方法，在設計階段評估自訂運算式型別。
Classes deriving from the class must override the method to evaluate the custom expression type at design time.
最少實作必須使用下列步驟：
At a minimum, an implementation must use the following steps:
1. 評估的運算式字串，並判斷運算式所參考的物件。Evaluate the expression string and determine the object that is referenced by the expression.
2. 傳回，如果無法評估運算式字串。Return , if the expression string cannot be evaluated.
3. 使用方法來判斷是否參考的物件可以指派直接移至控制項的屬性類型，然後根據結果，完成下列動作之一：Use the method on to determine whether the referenced object can be assigned directly to the control property type, and then, depending on the result, complete one of the following actions:
- 如果參考的物件可以直接指派給控制項屬性，傳回運算式所參考的物件。If the referenced object can be assigned directly to the control property, return the referenced object for the expression.
- 如果參考的物件是簡單類型，例如字串，就會傳回參考的物件。If the referenced object is a simple type, such as a string, return the referenced object.
- 否則，判斷參考的物件是否可以指派給或轉換為屬性類型。Otherwise, determine whether the referenced object can be assigned to or converted to the property type.
4. 使用方法物件來判斷是否參考的物件可以轉換移至控制項的屬性類型，然後根據結果，完成下列動作之一：Use the method on the object for to determine whether the referenced object can be converted to the control property type, and then, depending on the result, complete one of the following actions:
- 如果物件可以轉換成控制項屬性型別，傳回已轉換的物件使用方法。If the object can be converted to the control property type, return the converted object using the method.
- 如果參考的物件無法指派或轉換成，傳回參考的物件。If the referenced object cannot be assigned or converted to , return the referenced object.（選擇性）實作可以使用所提供的物件最佳化，或協助評估輸入的運算式字串之的實作。Optionally, the implementation can use the object that is supplied by the implementation to optimize or help in the evaluation of the input expression string.

MemberSignature.Value: public string ExpressionPrefix { get; }
.property instance string ExpressionPrefix
Public ReadOnly Property ExpressionPrefix As String
public: property System::String ^ ExpressionPrefix { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得運算式前置字元，辨識運算式編輯器實作所支援的運算式字串。

span.span: Gets the expression prefix that identifies expression strings that are supported by the expression editor implementation.

value.span: 字串，表示衍生自 之類別所支援的運算式前置字元，否則，如果運算式編輯器沒有關聯的運算式前置字元，則為空字串 ("")。

span.span: A string representing the prefix for expressions supported by the class derived from the ; otherwise, an empty string (""), if the expression editor does not have an associated expression prefix.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 運算式前置詞會識別自訂運算式型別，並關聯運算式產生器和運算式編輯器的運算式。The expression prefix identifies the custom expression type and associates an expression with the expression builder and expression editor. 當自訂運算式剖析在頁面中時，運算式前置詞用來建立執行個體相關聯的和類別。When custom expressions are parsed in a page, the expression prefix is used to create instances of the associated and classes. 若要使用運算式產生器和運算式編輯器關聯運算式前置字元，套用和屬性加入自訂類別，並設定運算式產生器中運算式前置字元`expressionBuilders`Web 組態檔中的項目。To associate an expression prefix with an expression builder and expression editor, apply the and attributes to the custom class and configure the expression prefix for an expression builder in the `expressionBuilders` element in the Web configuration file. 一般而言，衍生的類別不會覆寫屬性。Typically, derived classes do not override the property. 基底類別集值根據屬性相關聯之物件。The base class sets the value based on the attribute for the associated object.

summary.span: 傳回與運算式前置字元或運算式產生器關聯的 實作。

span.span: Returns an implementation that is associated with an expression prefix or expression builder.

param.name: expressionPrefix

summary.span: 傳回與指定之運算式前置字元關聯的 實作。

span.span: Returns an implementation that is associated with the specified expression prefix.

returns.span: 與 關聯的 實作，否則，如果 未定義或未與 關聯，則為 。

span.span: An implementation associated with ; otherwise, , if is not defined or is not associated with an .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用靜態方法多載，來尋找與特定運算式前置字元或運算式產生器類型相關聯的物件。Use the static method overloads to find the object that is associated with a particular expression prefix or expression builder type. 對於每個自訂運算式型別，運算式前置詞會識別相關聯的運算式產生器和運算式編輯器。For each custom expression type, an expression prefix identifies the associated expression builder and expression editor. 當自訂運算式剖析在頁面中時，運算式前置詞用來建立執行個體相關聯的和類別。When custom expressions are parsed in a page, the expression prefix is used to create instances of the associated and classes. 若要使用運算式產生器和運算式編輯器關聯運算式前置字元，套用和屬性加入自訂類別，並設定運算式產生器中運算式前置字元`expressionBuilders`Web 組態檔中的項目。To associate an expression prefix with an expression builder and expression editor, apply the and attributes to the custom class and configure the expression prefix for an expression builder in the `expressionBuilders` element in the Web configuration file. 若要尋找運算式前置詞相關聯的運算式編輯器方法會列舉可用實作是否有符合的前置詞。To find the associated expression editor for an expression prefix, the method enumerates the available implementations for a matching prefix. 實作可在設定`expressionBuilders`Web 組態檔區段。The implementations can be configured in the `expressionBuilders` section of the Web configuration file. 如果有的話實作定義運算式前置字元方法會傳回中所指定的型別屬性中繼資料。If an available implementation defines the expression prefix, the method returns the type that is specified in the attribute of the metadata.

span.span: is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用靜態多載來尋找與特定運算式前置字元或運算式產生器類型相關聯的物件。Use the static overloads to find the object that is associated with a particular expression prefix or expression builder type. 對於每個自訂運算式型別，運算式前置詞會識別相關聯的運算式產生器和運算式編輯器。For each custom expression type, an expression prefix identifies the associated expression builder and expression editor. 當自訂運算式剖析在頁面中時，運算式前置詞用來建立執行個體相關聯的和類別。When custom expressions are parsed in a page, the expression prefix is used to create instances of the associated and classes. 若要使用運算式產生器和運算式編輯器關聯運算式前置字元，套用和屬性加入自訂類別，並設定運算式產生器中運算式前置字元`expressionBuilders`Web 組態檔中的項目。To associate an expression prefix with an expression builder and expression editor, apply the and attributes to the custom class and configure the expression prefix for an expression builder in the `expressionBuilders` element in the Web configuration file. 方法會列舉可用找出實作`expressionBuilderType`。The method enumerates the available implementations to locate `expressionBuilderType`. 實作可在設定`expressionBuilders`Web 組態檔區段。The implementations can be configured in the `expressionBuilders` section of the Web configuration file. 如果`expressionBuilderType`找到可用的集中實作，方法會傳回中所指定的型別屬性中繼資料。If `expressionBuilderType` is found in the set of available implementations, the method returns the type that is specified in the attribute of the metadata.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual System.Web.UI.Design.ExpressionEditorSheet GetExpressionEditorSheet (string expression, IServiceProvider serviceProvider);

.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Web.UI.Design.ExpressionEditorSheet GetExpressionEditorSheet(string expression, class System.IServiceProvider serviceProvider) cil managed
Public Overridable Function GetExpressionEditorSheet (expression As String, serviceProvider As IServiceProvider) As ExpressionEditorSheet
public: virtual System::Web::UI::Design::ExpressionEditorSheet ^ GetExpressionEditorSheet(System::String ^ expression, IServiceProvider ^ serviceProvider);

param.name: expression
param.span: 針對控制項屬性設定的運算式字串，用來初始化運算式編輯器工作表。

span.span: The expression string set for a control property, used to initialize the expression editor sheet.

param.name: serviceProvider
param.span: 服務提供者實作，由設計工具主應用程式 (Designer Host) 提供，可以用來取得額外的設計階段服務。

span.span: A service provider implementation supplied by the designer host, used to obtain additional design-time services.

summary.span: 傳回與目前運算式編輯器關聯的運算式編輯器工作表。

span.span: Returns an expression editor sheet that is associated with the current expression editor.

returns.span: 可定義自訂運算式屬性的 。

span.span: An that defines the custom expression properties.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會傳回實作來定義結合以形成自訂運算式的字串。The method returns an implementation that defines the strings that are combined to form a custom expression. 視覺化設計工具可用於提示輸入的自訂運算式中結合的一或多個字串的運算式編輯器工作表。The visual designer uses an expression editor sheet to prompt for one or more strings that combine into a custom expression. 基底類別方法會傳回運算式中使用單一的輸入的字串的預設運算式編輯器表。The base class method returns a default expression editor sheet, which uses a single input string to form the expression. 運算式編輯器工作表定義運算式的屬性方格。The expression editor sheet defines the property grid for the expression. 因此，運算式編輯器所公開的屬性會變成可以在對話方塊中的運算式定義的屬性。Therefore, the properties that the expression editor exposes become properties that can be defined for the expression in the dialog box. 類別衍生自類別選擇可以覆寫方法以提供自訂運算式編輯器工作表。Classes deriving from the class optionally can override the method to provide a custom expression editor sheet. 自訂運算式編輯器工作表可以讓多個屬性，結合在一起以構成運算式字串的設計階段輸入。A custom expression editor sheet can allow design-time input for multiple properties, which are combined together to form the expression string. 例如，類別衍生自類別，並提供用於評估和關聯的控制項屬性中的資源字串參考，在設計階段實作。For example, the class derives from the class and provides an implementation for evaluating and associating a resource string reference with a control property at design time. 類別是運算式前置詞相關聯`Resources`和實作。The class is associated with the expression prefix `Resources` and the implementation. 方法會傳回，其定義的個別屬性，以形成資源參考運算式。The method returns a , which defines the individual properties that form a resource reference expression.

para.span: 一般而言，若要在設計階段提供新的運算式型別，您定義的唯一運算式前置詞，並提供自訂和實作。

span.span: Typically, to supply a new expression type at design time, you define a unique expression prefix and provide custom and implementations.

para.span: 或者，您可以提供自訂實作可定義用來構成運算式的內容。

span.span: Optionally, you can provide a custom implementation that defines properties that are used to form the expression.

para.span: 雖然組態檔中定義的前置詞，您也應該套用物件和物件。

span.span: Even though the configuration file defines the prefix, you should also apply an object and an object.

para.span: 覆寫方法以傳回自訂的運算式中定義多個屬性的設計階段輸入的運算式編輯器工作表。

span.span: Override the method to return an expression editor sheet that defines design-time input for multiple properties in a custom expression.

para.span: 當您選取的控制項屬性和運算式編輯器類型時，視覺化設計工具會呼叫方法，然後提供目前的運算式字串設定控制項屬性。

span.span: When you select a control property and the expression editor type, the visual designer calls the method, and then supplies the current expression string that is set for the control property.

para.span: 使用設定運算式屬性的初始值。

span.span: Use to set the initial values for the expression properties.

para.span: 使用初始化自訂運算式表建構函式，以及存取服務所提供的設計工具主應用程式。

span.span: Use to initialize a custom expression sheet constructor and to access services that are provided by the designer host.

para.span: 例如，呼叫方法存取專案項目、 文件，或提供視覺化設計工具的組態檔案詳細資料的類型。

span.span: For example, call the method with the type to access project items, documents, or configuration file details that are provided through the visual designer.
